.spectrum-CircleLoader {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  position: relative;
  direction: ltr;
}
.spectrum-CircleLoader-track {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-width: 3px;
  border-radius: 32px;
}
.spectrum-CircleLoader-fills {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
.spectrum-CircleLoader-fill {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-width: 3px;
  border-radius: 32px;
}
.spectrum-CircleLoader-fillMask1,
.spectrum-CircleLoader-fillMask2 {
  width: 50%;
  height: 100%;
  transform-origin: 100% center;
  transform: rotate(180deg);
  overflow: hidden;
  position: absolute;
}

html.lightbox-enabled body {
  overflow: hidden; }

html.lightbox-zoomed .lightbox-content {
  cursor: zoom-out;
  overflow: auto; }
  html.lightbox-zoomed .lightbox-content.zoomable-x {
    justify-content: flex-start; }
  html.lightbox-zoomed .lightbox-content.zoomable-y {
    align-items: baseline; }

html.lightbox-zoomed #lightbox-wrap img {
  max-width: inherit;
  max-height: inherit; }

html.lightbox-zoomed #lightbox-img-wrap .lightbox-extra {
  display: none; }

.lightbox-link,
.lightbox-content.zoomable {
  cursor: zoom-in; }

#lightbox-wrap .lightbox-contents {
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none; }

.lightbox-content {
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
  opacity: 1;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  transition: opacity .4s;
  width: 100vw; }

#lightbox-blocking {
  align-items: center;
  bottom: 0;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  left: 0;
  position: fixed;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 1002; }
  #lightbox-blocking .lightbox-spinner {
    display: none; }

#lightbox-wrap {
  height: 100%;
  left: 0;
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  width: 100vw;
  z-index: 1001; }
  #lightbox-wrap .offscreen, #lightbox-wrap.offscreen {
    height: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    visibility: hidden;
    -webkit-transform: translateX(-99999px);
    -ms-transform: translateX(-99999px);
    transform: translateX(-99999px);
    width: 0; }
  #lightbox-wrap.loading .lightbox-spinner {
    display: block; }
  #lightbox-wrap .hidden {
    opacity: 0; }
  #lightbox-wrap .lightbox-contents {
    display: inline-block;
    max-height: 100%;
    max-width: 100%; }
  #lightbox-wrap.single .next, #lightbox-wrap.single .next:hover,
  #lightbox-wrap.single .prev,

.mp__section {

}
.mp__section--collapsed .mp__section__collapse::before {
    left: 2px;
    top: 2px;
    transform: rotate(270deg);
}
.mp__section--collapsed .mp__list {
    height: 0;

}

    margin-bottom: 0;
}
.integrations {
  margin-bottom: 58px;
}
.mp__section--integration-gallery,
.mp__integrations {

}

  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;

}

}

}

}
.mp__integrations .link {

}
.mp__integrations .mp__section {
  background: #fcfcfc;
  max-height: 150px;
  overflow-y: scroll;
}
.mp__integrations .mp__section-note {

}
.mp__integrations .mp__section-note--bold {
  font-weight: bold;
}

  color: #999;

}
.mp__integrations.mp__integrations--empty, .mp__integrations.mp__integrations--unavailable, .mp__integrations.mp__integrations--empty-items,
.mp__integrations .mp__integrations_message {
  text-align: center;
}
.mp__integrations.vc-BehanceIntegrationSection .mp__integrations_select {
  margin-top: 18px;
}
.mp__integrations .mp__integration-list {
  overflow: hidden;
}

    max-height: 118px;

}
.mp__integration-list-title {
  border-bottom: 1px solid #e7e7e7;
  color: #666;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.mp__integration-list-title,
.mp__integrations .mp__list-item {
  cursor: default;
  padding: 5px 13px;
}
.mp__integration-list-title:hover,
  .mp__integrations .mp__list-item:hover {

}
.mp__list--gallery {

}
.mp__section--collapsed .mp__list--gallery {
  border-top: 0;
}
.mp__section__title {
  align-items: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  height: 40px;
  margin: 5px 0;
  padding-left: 25px;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
}
.mp__section--gallery .mp__section__title,
  .integrations .mp__section__title {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #e7e7e7;

}

    background: #fff;

  border-top-color: #999;

}

    display: inline;

    top: 1px;
}
.mp__list .mp__page-icon:last-child {
      margin-right: 0;

.mp__section__title:hover {

}

}
